r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $4.9M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Gunter Langkopf Maschinenbau. The average
  contract duration was 1.37 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $622.4K. The longest
  contract was 5.01 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.7M.
lookup_name: 'GUNTER LANGKOPF MASCHINENBAU'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '4.9M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '50'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '15'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '30%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-3%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.4'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '-283.8K'
s424_mean_duration: '1.37'
s421_mean_contract_value: '622.4K'
s425_max_duration: '5.01'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.7M'
